ygData.subject: Re: Need a bind in Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh I hate boats too.  The first time I took a boat I had my 6th level wizard and I had about 10 pieces of cloth armor, great staff... the works.  I took a ride
ygData.messageBody:
Oh I hate boats too. The first time I took a boat I had my 6th level wizard
and I had about 10 pieces of cloth armor, great staff... the works. I took
a ride to qeynos only to be killed by a shark through the boat. i lost
everything. In dismay I made a new character, an enchater. I got to forth
level, bought a guild tunic for 8g and set off for Qeynos, on my way back I
was memorizing spells and all of a sudden I was attacked by a fire elemental
and a zombie salior. I died and lost everything. I was told that a GM
would be notified, that was last friday and I have heard nothing. I have
been so unhappy.
------
When the people we love are stolen from us, the way to have them live on is
to never stop loving them. Buildings burn, people die, but real love is
forever. -- The Crow
-
